Heroes.name: Alchemist
Heroes.description1: EARNS EXTRA GOLD FROM UNIT KILLS AND BOUNTY RUNES
Heroes.description2: Synthesizing extra resources from each and every kill, Alchemist has no trouble gathering the tools needed to destroy his foes. Ambushing enemies with corrosive acid and a host of unstable chemicals, he battles to ensure his greedy escapades can remain uninterrupted.

skills.title: ACID SPRAY
skills.description: Sprays high-pressure acid across a target area. Enemy units who step across the contaminated terrain take damage per second and have their armor reduced.

skills.title: UNSTABLE CONCOCTION
skills.description: Alchemist brews up an unstable concoction that he can throw at an enemy hero, to stun and deal damage in an area around the explosion. The longer the concoction brews, the more damage it deals and the longer the stun. Alchemist is faster while charging the concoction. After 5.0 seconds, the brew reaches its maximum damage and stun time. However, after 5.5 seconds, the concoction will explode on Alchemist himself if not thrown.

skills.title: GREEVIL'S GREED
skills.description: Alchemist synthesizes additional gold from his enemies and bounty runes. With each kill, Alchemist earns base bonus gold and extra bonus gold. If Alchemist kills another unit which yields gold within the next 36.0 seconds, an additional instance of Extra Bonus Gold is added to the total. Additionally, causes bounty runes to yield more gold.

skills.title: BERSERK POTION
skills.description: Alchemist throws a potion at an ally, applying a basic dispel and giving them 50.0 Attack Speed, 30.0 Movement Speed and 40.0 HP regen.

Heroes.name: Ancient Apparition
Heroes.description1: LAUNCHES A POWERFUL ICY BLAST FROM ANYWHERE ON THE MAP
Heroes.description2: Able to launch a powerful blast of damaging ice across the battlefield, Ancient Apparition threatens to shatter weakened enemies wherever they are. Slowing enemies as he enhances his allies' effectiveness in battle, he is a constant threat to his foes.

skills.title: COLD FEET
skills.description: Places a frozen hex on an enemy unit that deals damage over time, but can be dispelled by moving away from the initial cast point. If the enemy unit doesn't move outside of the given range, it will be stunned and frozen in place after 4 seconds.

skills.title: ICE VORTEX
skills.description: Creates a vortex of icy energy that slows and increases magic damage done to enemies in its range.

skills.title: CHILLING TOUCH
skills.description: Enhances Ancient Apparition's attack with increased range, heavy magic damage, and movement slow.

skills.title: ICE BLAST
skills.description: Launches a tracer toward any location on the battlefield, which must be triggered again to mark the area to be blasted by a damaging explosion of hail. The further the tracer travels, the larger the explosion will be. Enemies caught in the explosion, or who touch the icy ball of hail as it travels, are Frostbitten, taking damage and prevented from regenerating or healing. If a Frostbitten unit's health drops below a certain percentage, they will instantly shatter.

Heroes.name: Anti-Mage
Heroes.description1: SLASHES HIS FOES WITH MANA-DRAINING ATTACKS
Heroes.description2: Should Anti-Mage have the opportunity to gather his full strength, few can stop his assaults. Draining mana from enemies with every strike or teleporting short distances to escape an ambush, cornering him is a challenge for any foe.

skills.title: MANA BREAK
skills.description: Burns an opponent's mana on each attack and deals damage equal to a percentage of the mana burnt. Enemies with no mana left are temporarily slowed.

skills.title: BLINK
skills.description: Short distance teleportation that allows Anti-Mage to move in and out of combat.

skills.title: COUNTERSPELL
skills.description: Passively grants you magic resistance. Can be activated to create an anti-magic shell around you that sends any targeted spells back towards enemies instead of affecting you.

skills.title: MANA VOID
skills.description: For each point of mana missing by the target unit, damage is dealt to it and surrounding enemies. The main target is also mini-stunned.

Heroes.name: Arc Warden
Heroes.description1: CREATES A COPY OF HIMSELF TO SPLIT PUSH
Heroes.description2: A splintered fragment of the same primordial power as the Ancients themselves, Zet the Arc Warden has pledged to see the clash between Radiant and Dire finally end. Assault lone enemies with fluxing energy, or distort space to generate a protective field around allies. Summon a Spark Wraith to patrol an area for enemies to infuse with harmful magic, then create a double of Zet, items and all, to overwhelm your foes.

skills.title: FLUX
skills.description: A splintered fragment of the same primordial power as the Ancients themselves, Zet the Arc Warden has pledged to see the clash between Radiant and Dire finally end. Assault lone enemies with fluxing energy, or distort space to generate a protective field around allies. Summon a Spark Wraith to patrol an area for enemies to infuse with harmful magic, then create a double of Zet, items and all, to overwhelm your foes.

skills.title: MAGNETIC FIELD
skills.description: Generates a circular distortion field of magnetic energy that grants bonus attack speed and protects allied heroes and buildings within it by evading attacks coming from outside the field.

skills.title: SPARK WRAITH
skills.description: Summons a Spark Wraith that slowly materializes and patrols a targeted area until an enemy comes within its range. Once a target has been found the wraith fuses with them, dealing magical damage and slowing the unit.

skills.title: TEMPEST DOUBLE
skills.description: Briefly refocusing its fractured elements into a single form, the Arc Warden is able to create a perfect electrical duplication of itself. The duplicate can use all of Arc Warden's current items and spells, except most consumables and items that drop on death. The duplicate has separate item and ability cooldowns. The Tempest Double gives bounty gold to enemies when killed. The Tempest Double loses its sense of self if he is too far away from Arc Warden and deals less attack damage.

Heroes.name: Axe
Heroes.description1: TAUNTS AND FORCES ENEMIES TO ATTACK HIM
Heroes.description2: One after another, Axe cuts down his foes. Marching ahead of his team, he locks his enemies in battle then counters their blows with a deadly spin of his weapon. Slamming his culling blade through a weakened enemy, he is always charging onward.

skills.title: BERSERKER'S CALL
skills.description: Axe taunts nearby enemy units, forcing them to attack him, while he gains bonus armor during the duration.

skills.title: MBATTLE HUNGER
skills.description: Enrages an enemy unit, causing it to take damage over time until it kills another unit or the duration ends. The damage is increased by a factor of Axe's armor. The enemy is also slowed as long as he's facing away from Axe.

skills.title: SCOUNTER HELIX
skills.description: When attacked, Axe has a chance to perform a helix counter attack, dealing pure damage to all nearby enemies.

skills.title: CULLING BLADE
skills.description: Axe spots a weakness and strikes, dealing pure damage. When an enemy hero is killed with Culling Blade, its cooldown is reset, Axe gains bonus armor permanently and all nearby allied units gain bonus movement speed.

Heroes.name: Bane
Heroes.description1: PUTS HIS ENEMIES TO SLEEP, INCAPACITATING THEM
Heroes.description2: Bane brings terror to his enemies with his arsenal of disabling abilities. Whether trapping a foe within a contagious nightmare, or gripping an enemy in place, he gives allies all the time they need to slay their enemy.

skills.title: ENFEEBLE
skills.description: Lowers the enemy's total attack damage, cast range, and regeneration.

skills.title: BRAIN SAP
skills.description: Feasts on the vital energies of an enemy unit, healing Bane and dealing damage.

skills.title: NIGHTMARE
skills.description: Puts the target enemy or friendly Hero to sleep. Sleeping units are awakened when damaged. If the target was directly attacked, the Nightmare passes to the attacking unit. Bane can attack nightmared targets freely. Enemy Units take Pure Damage Per Second while in Nightmare.

skills.title: FIEND'S GRIP
skills.description: CHANNELED - Grips an enemy unit, disabling it and causing heavy damage over time, while stealing mana every 0.5 seconds based on the unit's maximum mana.

Heroes.name: Beastmaster
Heroes.description1: SUMMONS BEASTS TO AID HIS HUNT
Heroes.description2: Summoning a poison-spitting boar and a scouting hawk to aid his hunt, Beastmaster never stalks the battlefield unprepared. Chopping through the forest with his axes, his stunning roar opens the way for his allies to devastate enemies.

skills.title: WILD AXES
skills.description: Beastmaster sends his axes flying and calls them home again, slicing through enemy units and trees along their path.  Each axe can hit an enemy once, and amplifies subsequent damage from Beastmaster and his units.

skills.title: CALL OF THE WILD BOAR
skills.description: Beastmaster calls forth a Boar to aid in the battlefield.

skills.title: CALL OF THE WILD HAWK
skills.description: Beastmaster sends an invisible Hawk to scout an area.

skills.title: INNER BEAST
skills.description: Untaps the inner fury of nearby allies, passively increasing their attack speed.

skills.title: PRIMAL ROAR
skills.description: Beastmaster lets loose a deafening roar that stuns, and shoves open a path to its target. All units in the path of the roar are damaged, while units shoved aside by the roar have their movement and attack speed slowed. Additionally, Beastmaster and his units gain 40.0% movement speed for 3 seconds.

Heroes.name: Abaddon
Heroes.description1: SHIELDS HIS ALLIES OR HIMSELF FROM ATTACKS
Heroes.description2: Able to transform enemy attacks into self-healing, Abaddon can survive almost any assault. Shielding allies and launching his double-edged coil at a friend or foe, he is always ready to ride into the thick of battle.

skills.title: MIST COIL
skills.description: Abaddon releases a coil of deathly mist that can damage an enemy unit or heal a friendly unit at the cost of some of Abaddon's health.

skills.title: APHOTIC SHIELD
skills.description: Summons dark energies around an ally unit, creating a shield that absorbs a set amount of damage before expiring. When the shield is destroyed it will burst and deal damage equal to the amount it could absorb to an area around it. Removes certain types of negative buffs and stuns on cast.

skills.title: CURSE OF AVERNUS
skills.description: Abaddon strikes an enemy, slowing the target's movement speed. If the target gets hit 4.0 times, they become affected by a chilling curse causing them to be silenced and slowed, and all attacks against them gain an attack speed boost.

skills.title: BORROWED TIME
skills.description: When activated, all damage dealt to you will heal instead of harm. Most negative buffs will also be removed. If the ability is not on cooldown, it will automatically activate if your health falls below 400.0.
